outline:
1. to soothe, still, stroke
    1. (Piel) to soothe, still
    2. (Hiphil) stilling (participle)
  2. to laud, praise, commend
    1. (Piel)
      1. to laud, praise (God)
      2. to commend, congratulate (the dead)
    2. (Hithpael) to boast
kjv_def: commend, glory, keep in, praise, still, triumph.
strongs_def: properly, to address in aloud tone, i.e. (specifically) loud; figuratively, to pacify (as if by words)
